text: I'm here with Apple's new MacBook Pro
it's completely redesigned it's the
first time Apple has had a significant
update to the MacBook Pro in several
years and there's a lot of excitement
around this product so let's take a look
see how the new touch bar works and some
overall impressions of the new MacBook
Pro so the MacBook Pro has been
redesigned from the ground up in fact
it's about the same size and weight as
the MacBook Air which is really
impressive to have all that power in a
device the same size as that slim
MacBook but let's move on to the touch
bar since that's the real new story here
the touch bar has a nice matte finish to
it so the keys kind of blend into the
physical keys on the keyboard and by
default you have all the standard
function keys you're used to and Siri
but it's really cool is how much the
touch bar changes when you're using
different apps so let's do an example of
that let's open up Safari and you see
right away all my bookmarks pop up right
here so you just tap the website you
want to go to it's really cool and apps
like iMessage or anything else with the
text field you get some suggestions at
the top of what to type in just like you
do on your iPhone and you also have this
really cool emoji keyboard and its
really great for formatting text too so
if I'm typing an email you can see a
bunch of new formatting options pop
right up you can change the color easily
you can also customize the touch bar so
you can have the function keys you
commonly use right there at all times
and then you can drag the icons you want
down from the screen to the touch bar
like that another part of the touch bar
is touch ID that's the same fingerprint
sensor you have in the iPhone and iPad
now on the macbook for the first time
and it's used to login to your machine
and make payments through Apple pay
using Safari it also has a new kind of
port called Thunderbolt 3 it's the
universal port for everything so you use
it to charge up the computer attach
external displays and a lot more but
there's a downside to that a lot of the
ports that people loved in the MacBook
are gone now so even if you want to plug
in and charge your iPhone you're going
to have
to buy a separate kind of cable
internally the MacBook Pro is a lot
faster than before but however it's not
enough power for a lot of pros and use
the MacBook for things like video
editing coding and photo editing there's
another drawback and that's the price
the touch bar MacBook Pro starts at
$17.99 and goes way up from there
however this is the nicest MacBook Apple
has ever made and if you're willing to
spend the money on it you're not going
to be disappointed
